reviewText: Got this for our dirt bike riding son for his 6 birthday.  He loves it and so do we because we know there is no bad language in it.

I bought this video because 2 friends of mine, Gene Stull and Donnie Mcgourty are in the 2nd Series of it. It was Great to see so many other Great riders from over the years in these as well! I would recommend this to anyone that has a Love for dirt bikes and racing!

This was an amazing purchase..well worth $30 for all four movies on 2 discs...my boys love it!!! They watch it at least once a day...this is classic....some of the best motocrossers from today back when they were just starting out...its pretty cool to see where they started out!

Great item for those mini warriors at your house to keep them happy when they can't ride. My nephews watches these on VHS for hours now my boys get to watch the great experiences of some of the great dirtbike riders of today when they were just beginning.
